markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 10"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Ensnaring Wrappings](/Feats.aspx?ID=3528) <actions string="Reaction" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Book of the Dead](/Sources.aspx?ID=118) pg. 53</row>

**Archetype** [Mummy](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=180)

**Prerequisites**
[Mummy Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=3520)

**Trigger**
Your Strike deals physical damage to a creature that is within reach of your arms and isn't more than one size larger than you.

</column>

---

Some of your wrappings come loose to ensnare a creature you recently damaged. You attempt to [Grapple](/Actions.aspx?ID=35) the creature you damaged.
name: Ensnaring Wrappings
